turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good Morning Donna, can you do me a favor?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing Turker, what do you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wouldn't say need, but can you order me a pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Inferno Pizzeria Napoleano in Darnestown.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of pizza do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I love their Oven Roasted Potato and Onion pizza. What are the add ons I can do?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: For $2.50 you can add: Pepperoni, Smoked Prosciutto, Bacon, 'Nduja, Sausage Casalinga, Organic Egg, Fior di Latte, Ricotta, Smoked Mozzarella

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the less expensive ones?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: For $1.50 you can add: Roasted Onions, Potatoes, Slow Roasted Garlic, Arugula, Calabrian Chiles, Basil

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to add prosciutto, ricotta, and basil to the pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds delicious. Pickup or delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick up. I'm headed that way after work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright so I have an Oven Roasted Potato and Onion pizza with added ricotta, prosciutto and basil. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I think that should be enough to fill me up!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. I'm submitting the order now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order should be ready in about 25 minutes for pick up

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic! Can you send my receipt to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You should be getting a text and an email any minute with your pizza receipt

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Donna!

items.name: Oven Roasted Potato and Onion pizza
